column2:
COVID-19 negative certification required for entering the country.
All travellers entering Denmark from outside EU and Schengen must take a test at a test center within 24 hours upon entry.
There are no travel restrictions if you enter from EU or Schengen countries.
column3:
Self-isolation at own accommodation.
There are no travel restrictions if you enter from EU or Schengen countries. All travellers entering Denmark from outside EU and Schengen must take a test at a test center within 24 hours upon entry. Please note that self-tests are not valid for this purpose.
column4:
Proof of vaccination. Validity:
There are no travel restrictions if you enter from EU or Schengen countries.

Internal Restrictions:
*Travel in Denmark: The Danish Government regularly monitors the risks of COVID-19, and adjusts measures in line with the levels of infection to contain the spread of Coronavirus.
*If you test positive for COVID-19 in Denmark: You should immediately self-isolate and follow the Danish authorities guidance.
